alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:22PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Collier County through 800 PM EDT... At 721 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Vineyards, or near Naples, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Belle Meade, Orangetree, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Big Corkscrew Island, Vineyards, Naples Park, Naples Manor, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, North Naples, Pelican Bay, Lely, Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd and Fiddlers Creek. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
